title: icons...
body: OKAY there is this ''ratchet'' in an icon and what looks to be a bolt inside of the ratchet and a hand holding it up... with a blueish animation going on around it... how do i get this icon I've searched everywhere.

replies.body:
If this is the Icon you're talking about:

https://imgur.com/a/h3UJm

Then you're inquiring about the *Alpha Tester Icon*, which was given to every player that participated in testing the new client when it was still in Alpha, **before** it headed to the Beta State, which it's currently in.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
